fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Bug a player, you learn what evil faction roles visited them tonight and put those on permanent record.
- Privately investigate all players on permanent record, you learn who each one visits individually. (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You know who each evil faction visits at the end of each night.
- Your marks may be removed by purging/cleansing effects.
